config.name: Alert Banner UI Extension App
config.description: Parent app for the Ticket alert banner card; functions on Deals, Companies, and Services also; last modified by Drew Zingleman 1-27-26; Uses properties alert_title (single-line text), alert_description (single-line text), alert_type (dropdown, lookup details on the HubSpot Alert Component), and alert_present (single checkbox). If alert properties are not present, they must be created. Card gets added to sidebar.
